timeSync.title: Your computer's clock is not synced.
timeSync.description: To successfully synchronize with the Ellaism network, you need to sync your computer's clock with a time sync server.
timeSync.win32: Go to your Internet Time Settings in your system preferences and check the box. See this guide for details: http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/
timeSync.linux: To enable a time sync server, install "ntp" via "apt-get install ntp".
timeSync.darwin: To enable time sync, open the time preferences and check "Set the time and date automatically".

nodeChecksumMismatch.title: Checksum mismatch in downloaded node!
nodeChecksumMismatch.description:
__algorithm__: __hash__

Please install the __type__ node version __version__ manually.

legacyChain.title: Legacy chain detected
legacyChain.description:
Your node is currently on the unsupported Ethereum Classic chain. To use this chain, use tools provided by the ethereum classic project at
https://ethereumclassic.github.io.

To revert to the main ethereum chain follow the tutorial here:
https://github.com/ethereum/mist/releases/0.8.2

onboarding.description: Ellaism is a platform for decentralized blockchain apps with a fully featured programming language
onboarding.goToTestnetDescription: Test the technology freely in a sandboxed testnet, without using real Ether.
onboarding.gotoMainnetDescription: You’ll need some Ether to create and execute contracts. Don't worry, we'll help you get some...
onboarding.doYouHaveAWalletFile: Do you have a wallet file?
onboarding.walletFileDescription: Move any wallet file here to import.
onboarding.protectDescription: Choose a password for your new account. Make it as strong as if it were to protect your house keys!
onboarding.etherDescription: The ellaism network is based on a token called “Ella”. You’ll need a small amount of it to do anything on the Ellaism network.
onboarding.loadItDescription:
If you already own Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency, you can easily convert it to ether using Shapeshift.

We recommend loading somewhere between 0.25 to 1 ether.
onboarding.faucetDescription: The Rinkeby testnet uses Clique Proof of Authority as a consensus mechanism, therefore there's no mining. If you want to get some test ether, head to the Rinkeby Faucet: faucet.rinkeby.io
onboarding.tutorial1Description:
Now the only thing left to do is wait for the download to finish. Here are some reading suggestions:

Make your own money

Make a cryptocurrency with a fixed market supply, tokens representing real world assets, etc
onboarding.tutorial2Description:
Create a crowdsale

Raise funds for a common goal, fully trustable without a third party. Sidestep the hurdle of traditional funding system and go directly to the source by funding an organization via the blockchain.
onboarding.tutorial3Description:
Create a blockchain organization

Create an autonomous organization with rules on spending money and making decisions for you and your investors.

onboarding.description: Ellaism is a platform for decentralized blockchain apps with a fully featured programming language
onboarding.goToTestnetDescription: Test the technology freely in a sandboxed testnet, without using real Ether.
onboarding.gotoMainnetDescription: You’ll need some Ether to create and execute contracts. Don't worry, we'll help you get some...
onboarding.doYouHaveAWalletFile: Do you have a wallet file?
onboarding.walletFileDescription: Move any wallet file here to import.
onboarding.protectDescription: Choose a password for your new account. Make it as strong as if it were to protect your house keys!
onboarding.etherDescription: The ellaism network is based on a token called “Ella”. You’ll need a small amount of it to do anything on the Ellaism network.
onboarding.loadItDescription:
If you already own Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency, you can easily convert it to ether using Shapeshift.

We recommend loading somewhere between 0.25 to 1 ether.
onboarding.faucetDescription: The Rinkeby testnet uses Clique Proof of Authority as a consensus mechanism, therefore there's no mining. If you want to get some test ether, head to the Rinkeby Faucet: faucet.rinkeby.io
onboarding.tutorial1Description:
Now the only thing left to do is wait for the download to finish. Here are some reading suggestions:

Make your own money

Make a cryptocurrency with a fixed market supply, tokens representing real world assets, etc
onboarding.tutorial2Description:
Create a crowdsale

Raise funds for a common goal, fully trustable without a third party. Sidestep the hurdle of traditional funding system and go directly to the source by funding an organization via the blockchain.
onboarding.tutorial3Description:
Create a blockchain organization

Create an autonomous organization with rules on spending money and making decisions for you and your investors.

timeSync.title: Your computer's clock is not synced.
timeSync.description: To successfully synchronize with the Ellaism network, you need to sync your computer's clock with a time sync server.
timeSync.win32: Go to your Internet Time Settings in your system preferences and check the box. See this guide for details: http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/
timeSync.linux: To enable a time sync server, install "ntp" via "apt-get install ntp".
timeSync.darwin: To enable time sync, open the time preferences and check "Set the time and date automatically".

onboarding.description: Ellaism is a platform for decentralized blockchain apps with a fully featured programming language
onboarding.goToTestnetDescription: Test the technology freely in a sandboxed testnet, without using real Ether.
onboarding.gotoMainnetDescription: You’ll need some Ether to create and execute contracts. Don't worry, we'll help you get some...
onboarding.doYouHaveAWalletFile: Do you have a wallet file?
onboarding.walletFileDescription: Move any wallet file here to import.
onboarding.protectDescription: Choose a password for your new account. Make it as strong as if it were to protect your house keys!
onboarding.etherDescription: The ellaism network is based on a token called “Ella”. You’ll need a small amount of it to do anything on the Ellaism network.
onboarding.loadItDescription:
If you already own Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency, you can easily convert it to ether using Shapeshift.

We recommend loading somewhere between 0.25 to 1 ether.
onboarding.faucetDescription: The Rinkeby testnet uses Clique Proof of Authority as a consensus mechanism, therefore there's no mining. If you want to get some test ether, head to the Rinkeby Faucet: faucet.rinkeby.io
onboarding.tutorial1Description:
Now the only thing left to do is wait for the download to finish. Here are some reading suggestions:

Make your own money

Make a cryptocurrency with a fixed market supply, tokens representing real world assets, etc
onboarding.tutorial2Description:
Create a crowdsale

Raise funds for a common goal, fully trustable without a third party. Sidestep the hurdle of traditional funding system and go directly to the source by funding an organization via the blockchain.
onboarding.tutorial3Description:
Create a blockchain organization

Create an autonomous organization with rules on spending money and making decisions for you and your investors.

Raise funds for a common goal, fully trustable without a third party. Sidestep the hurdle of traditional funding system and go directly to the source by funding an organization via the blockchain.
onboarding.tutorial3Description:
Create a blockchain organization

Create an autonomous organization with rules on spending money and making decisions for you and your investors.

errors.nodeNotStartedYet: Wait a few more seconds until your node is fully started and try again

connectAccount.connectAccountDescription: You are sharing your identity with __dappName__. This allows the app to see any public information related to your accounts, including balances connected to it.

elements.checksumAlert: This address looks valid, but it doesn't have some security features that will protect you against typos, so double check you have the right one. If provided, check if the security icon matches.
elements.identiconHelper: This is a security icon.  If there were any change to the address, the resulting icon would be a completely different one

errors.nodeConnect: Couldn't connect to node? See the logs for more:
errors.nodeStartup: It seems like the node couldn't be started.  Do you already have one running? Is it upgrading the database right now?

timeSync.title: Your computer's clock is not synced.
timeSync.description: To successfully synchronize with the Ellaism network, you need to sync your computer's clock with a time sync server.
timeSync.win32: Go to your Internet Time Settings in your system preferences and check the box. See this guide for details: http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/
timeSync.linux: To enable a time sync server, install "ntp" via "apt-get install ntp".
timeSync.darwin: To enable time sync, open the time preferences and check "Set the time and date automatically".

nodeChecksumMismatch.title: Checksum mismatch in downloaded node!
nodeChecksumMismatch.description:
__algorithm__: __hash__

Please install the __type__ node version __version__ manually.

legacyChain.title: Legacy chain detected
legacyChain.description:
Your node is currently on the unsupported Ethereum Classic chain. To use this chain, use tools provided by the ethereum classic project at
https://ethereumclassic.github.io.

To revert to the main ethereum chain follow the tutorial here:
https://github.com/ethereum/mist/releases/0.8.2

nodeInfo.mainnetExplain: You are on the main Ellaism global network
nodeInfo.testnetExplain: You are on the __name__. DO NOT SEND any real Ella to these addresses
nodeInfo.privatenetExplain: You are on a private net. DO NOT SEND any real ella to these addresses
nodeInfo.unknownnetExplain: Unable to determine which network you are on

startScreen.nodeConnectionTimeout:
Couldn't start Ellaism node!
If you installed Geth, use this command to run it:
geth --ipcpath __path__
Or report an issue
startScreen.nodeBinaryNotFound:
No Ellaism node binary found!
Please start one manually before.
startScreen.unableToBindPort: Ellaism node cannot run. Is another instance already running?
startScreen.nodeSyncing: Ellaism node needs to sync, please wait...
startScreen.nodeSyncInfoStates:
Downloading block __displayBlock__ of __highestBlock__,
Downloading chain structure __displayState__ of __displayKnownStates__

updateAvailable.noUpdateFound: No update found. You are running the latest version of __name__.

requestAccount.title: Create account
requestAccount.backupHint:
Make sure you backup your keyfiles AND password!

You can find your keyfiles folder using the main menu -> Accounts -> Backup -> Accounts. Keep a copy of the "keystore" folder where you can't lose it!

sendTransactionConfirmation.contractExecutionInfo: You are about to execute a function on a contract. This might involve transfer of value.
sendTransactionConfirmation.contractCreationInfo: You are about to create a contract from the provided data.
sendTransactionConfirmation.enterPassword: Enter password to confirm the transaction
sendTransactionConfirmation.estimatedGasError: It seems this transaction will fail. If you submit it, it may consume all the gas you provide.
sendTransactionConfirmation.transactionThrow: The contract won't allow this transaction to be executed
sendTransactionConfirmation.overBlockGasLimit: The gas required for this execution could exceed the block gas limit.
sendTransactionConfirmation.notEnoughGas:
Gas might not be enough to successfully finish this transaction.
Click here to increase the gas amount.

errors.connectionTimeout: Couldn't connect to the node, did it crash in the background?
errors.multipleKeysMatchAddress: Multiple keys match address.  Please remove duplicates from keystore (menu -> accounts -> backup -> accounts)
errors.insufficientFundsForGas: Insufficient funds in main account (etherbase) to pay for gas

sendTransactionConfirmation.lookupDataExplainer: Look this up on the internet

onboarding.description: Ellaism is a platform for decentralized blockchain apps with a fully featured programming language
onboarding.goToTestnetDescription: Test the technology freely in a sandboxed testnet, without using real Ether.
onboarding.gotoMainnetDescription: You’ll need some Ether to create and execute contracts. Don't worry, we'll help you get some...
onboarding.doYouHaveAWalletFile: Do you have a wallet file?
onboarding.walletFileDescription: Move any wallet file here to import.
onboarding.protectDescription: Choose a password for your new account. Make it as strong as if it were to protect your house keys!
onboarding.etherDescription: The ellaism network is based on a token called “Ella”. You’ll need a small amount of it to do anything on the Ellaism network.
onboarding.loadItDescription:
If you already own Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency, you can easily convert it to ether using Shapeshift.

We recommend loading somewhere between 0.25 to 1 ether.
onboarding.faucetDescription: The Rinkeby testnet uses Clique Proof of Authority as a consensus mechanism, therefore there's no mining. If you want to get some test ether, head to the Rinkeby Faucet: faucet.rinkeby.io
onboarding.tutorial1Description:
Now the only thing left to do is wait for the download to finish. Here are some reading suggestions:

Make your own money

Make a cryptocurrency with a fixed market supply, tokens representing real world assets, etc
